meanings.definition: Not having arrived, happened, or been done by the expected time.
meanings.sent1: The overdue package finally arrived today.
meanings.sent2: The library book was overdue by a week.
meanings.sent3: The overdue train seemed to have taken a detour.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was overdue, like a forgotten promise.
meanings.sent5: The overdue assignment loomed over her like a dark cloud.

meanings.definition: Not paid at the scheduled time.
meanings.sent1: The overdue bill caused stress for the family.
meanings.sent2: The overdue rent payment was a concern for the landlord.
meanings.sent3: The overdue fine felt like a mischievous prank.
meanings.sent4: His overdue debt weighed on him like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The overdue invoice demanded immediate attention.

meanings.definition: Excessive or beyond the usual time.
meanings.sent1: The overdue meeting lasted until midnight.
meanings.sent2: The overdue vacation extended by a few days.
meanings.sent3: The overdue party turned into a never-ending celebration.
meanings.sent4: His overdue speech went on longer than expected.
meanings.sent5: The overdue wait felt like an eternity.
